events22.devfestDescription: DevFests are local tech conferences hosted by Google Developer Groups around the world. These conferences focus on Google technologies. We enjoyed listening to experts talk about our favorite technologies and connecting with developers ğŸ’¡
events22.devfestImageAlt: Machine Learning in Twitter Data Session
events22.blackHatDescription: We had the pleasure of attending Black Hat MEA, a three-day cyber security and hacking convention that brought together over 30,000 attendees, 250 exhibitors, and 200 speakers from around the world ğŸŒ
events22.reactWorkshopDescription: A React workshop, where we had the pleasure of learning from CTO Fahad Allibdi himself, and learned about the most recent React features, best practices, and how to build high-performing React applications ğŸš€
events22.reactWorkshopImageAlt: Attendees of the React workshop learning about React features
events22.coffeethonDescription: We hosted a Coffeethon intro session with Eng. Yousef Al-Faris and Mr. Al-Mohanad Al-Marawi, CEO of Arabian Coffee Institute and Coffeethons founder!
events22.coffeethonImageAlt: Red coffee beans in hand farmers - Thailand
events22.desertCodeDescription: A Java Programming Challenge to put students' programming skills to the test in a thrilling and educational experience. Participants solved 20 unique challenges against the clock to emerge victorious ğŸ†
events22.desertCodeImageAlt: One of the students solving a challenge in Desert Code Oasis
events22.studentCeremonyDescription: The Google Developer Student Club Al Yamamah won the third place ğŸ¥‰ in the best student club contest at Al Yamamah University.
events22.studentCeremonyImageAlt: Yazeed Al-Khalaf (club lead) receiving the award on behalf of the club

events23.gitWorkshopDescription: A Git & GitHub Workshop, guided by Nawaf Al-Shawan. Participants gained knowledge on installing Git, navigating through its commands, and leveraging the GitHub Student Developer ğŸ“¦
events23.gitWorkshopImageAlt: Participants attentively listening to the presenter during the workshop
events23.enterpriseTalkDescription: Maryam Al-Dhewalia, Manager at Solutions by STC, presented an introductory talk on Enterprise Architecture, exploring its principles and impact on both business and governmental advancements ğŸŒ†
events23.enterpriseTalkImageAlt: Maryam Al-Dhewalia gesturing towards an Enterprise Architecture diagram during the talk
events23.flutterWorkshopDescription: An introductory immersive Flutter workshop conducted by Yazeed AlKhalaf, 2022 - 2023 lead. Participants delved into cross-platform app development, getting to grips with the basics of Flutter and starting to build their apps ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»
events23.flutterWorkshopImageAlt: Yazeed AlKhalaf presenting the Flutter workshop with the Flutter mascot on the podium
events23.gameCampDescription: A comprehensive three-day game development bootcamp presented in Arabic by a team of elite Saudi game developers, where participants immersed themselves in the exciting world of game creation, gaining hands-on experience ğŸ®
events23.gameCampImageAlt: Ghada Baazim explaining how lighting and environment guide players in game design, using in-game imagery as an example
